text: "Spicks and Specks" is a 1966 song written by Bee Gees and is the title track to their second studio album Spicks and Specks. It topped the single charts in New Zealand and Australia, number 56 in Japan and number 2 in the Netherlands. ==References== Category:1966 songs Category:Bee Gees songs Category:The Searchers (band) songs Category:Status Quo songs Category:Pop songs
title: Spicks and Specks (song)
